pages.text: Arau amara adesa kerala eta katha, cakura palakara darae
Arau ami tomalokara darae bahutake dhbansa karaicho; eteke upadesa grahanakarai konoba achene
arau sihamte yi karaiche, se'i sakalo ‘amalanamata’ (lipibad'dha) ache
arau sakalo sarau-bara katha likhita ache
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba baga-bagica arau nijaraasamuhara majata
yathayogya asanata, sarbasaktimana maha adhipati (allaha)ra sannidhyata
Ara-raahamana, (dayamaya allaha)
teraemi siksa diche kora'ana
teraemi srsti karaiche manuha
teraemi taka bhasa sika'iche
Surya arau candra nirdharaita hicapa anuyayi arartana karae
arau trnalata arau brksadiye chajada karae
arau teraemi akasakhanaka samunnata karaiche arau sthapana karaiche tulacani
yate tomaloke jokha-makhata simalanghana nakaraa
Arau tomaloke n'yayasangatabharae ojana pratistha karaa arau ojanakrta bastu kama nidiba
Arau prthiraikhanaka te'om srsti jirara babe sthapana karaiche
ya’ta ache phala-mula arau khejura gacha, yara phala araranamukta
arau ache bakaliyukta dana arau sugandhiyukta phula
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraemi manuhaka srsti karaiche pani misraita sukana matira paraa yito poraa matira darae
arau teraemi jinaka srsti karaiche dhomraabihina agnisikhara paraa
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
